Asụsụ Kpelle /kəˈpɛlə/ (endonym: "Kpɛlɛɛ") bụ ndị Kpelle nke Liberia, Guinea na Ivory Coast na-asụ ma bụrụ akụkụ nke ezinụlọ Mande nke asụsụ

Guinean Kpelle (nke a makwaara dị ka Guerze na French), nke ọkara nde mmadụ na-asụ, lekwasịrị anya nke ọma, mana ọ bụghị naanị, na mpaghara ọhịa nke Guinea, nke isi obodo ya, Nzérékoré, bụ obodo nke atọ kachasị na Guinea na obodo kacha ibu na Guinea
Mpaghara Guinée forestière nke dị na ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ Guinea nke gbara Liberia, Ivory Coast, na Sierra Leone
Ọkara nde ndị Liberia na-asụ Kpelle Liberia, nke a na-akụzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Liberia.
